00162     // error_category(const error_category &) = delete;

00164

00168

00172 
00175     inline virtual bool equivalent(int code, const error_condition &condition) const;
00176 
00179     inline virtual bool equivalent(const error_code &code, int condition) const;
00180 
00183     virtual std::string message(int ev) const = 0;
00184

00188 
00191     inline bool operator!=(const error_category &rhs) const;
00192
